Trend or status 2050: Lower consumption levels in HICs, increased consumption in LICs
Trend or status 2100: Less carbon (travel) intensive consumption; lower consumption levels

Trend or status 2050: Medium; power grid is increasingly decarbonized, but not completely
Trend or status 2100: Low; the system is as decarbonized as possible (electrification)

Trend or status 2050: Widespread in HICs; increasing use of IT services for teleworking, car sharing, intermodal travel, …
Trend or status 2100: Widespread, high speed and capacity networks; IT services for teleworking, car sharing, intermodal travel, …

Trend or status 2050: High; big cities accumulate a big share of the activity
Trend or status 2100: Medium; cities are hotspots, but jobs are spread amongst them

Trend or status 2050: Medium to large; megacities and (sub)urban sprawl beginning to shrink
Trend or status 2100: Medium; avoidance of megacities or (sub)urban sprawl

Trend or status 2050: Increasing demand supply; higher than the baseline (2017)
Trend or status 2100: Majority of demand supply; much higher than the baseline (2017)
Still relevant, but much lower than the baseline (2017)

Trend or status 2050: Accessibility as a focus, managed, reasonable travel time, integrated
Trend or status 2100: Accessibility, local in scale, slowed down, managed, reasonable travel time and reliability, integrated

Trend or status 2050: Public mobility as an affordable and accessible service
Trend or status 2100: Public mobility as a reliable, comfortable, enjoyable and accessible service

Trend or status 2050: Automobility fills accessibility gaps; symbolic status decreasing
Trend or status 2100: Automobility as a utility to serve a special need
High (especially in rural or remote areas)

Variable or feature: Automobility infrastructure investments (roads, fuel stations, etc.)
Trend or status 2050: Medium; maintenance dominates in HICs; capacity increased in LICs
Trend or status 2100: Low to medium; maintenance covers the majority of the investments; capacity is not increased

Trend or status 2050: Battery electric vehicles and hybrids for short-medium ranged trips; biofuelled for long range
Trend or status 2100: Battery electric vehicles for short-medium ranged trips; hydrogen fuelled for long range
